title: Not properly setup eslint config or eslint version
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**
Report a bug

**What is the current behavior?**
In `13.14.1`version of eslint lint gulp task return 20 errors about indentation.
In `13.10.2`(bottom line version) operate normally
```
/Users/rastopyr/programming/js/react/src/renderers/shared/shared/__tests__/ReactCompositeComponentState-test.js
  305:9   error  Expected indentation of 6 spaces but found 8   indent
  307:11  error  Expected indentation of 8 spaces but found 10  indent
  308:11  error  Expected indentation of 8 spaces but found 10  indent
  309:9   error  Expected indentation of 6 spaces but found 8   indent

/Users/rastopyr/programming/js/react/src/renderers/shared/shared/__tests__/ReactMultiChild-test.js
  372:11  error  Expected indentation of 8 spaces but found 10   indent
  373:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  374:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  375:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  376:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  377:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  378:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  379:11  error  Expected indentation of 8 spaces but found 10   indent
  380:11  error  Expected indentation of 8 spaces but found 10   indent
  381:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  382:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  383:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  384:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  385:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  386:13  error  Expected indentation of 10 spaces but found 12  indent
  387:11  error  Expected indentation of 8 spaces but found 10   indent
```

**If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce and if possible a minimal demo of the problem via https://jsfiddle.net or similar (template: https://jsfiddle.net/reactjs/69z2wepo/).**
1. Clone repo
2. `npm i`
3. `npm run lint`

**What is the expected behavior?**
In package.json setted `^13.10.2` version. So, it means - latest minor/patch version, higher than this, will be installed.

I think, we have 3 way for solve this issue:
1. Set strict version of eslint in `package.json`
2. Change files, that not passed of lint.
3. Change eslint config rules
